characters: A truck in front of the self-driving vehicle, a person on the right side of the road, and a person on a motorcycle on the right side of the road.
summary: The self-driving vehicle is traveling on an urban road, following a truck. A person is walking on the right side of the road, and a person is riding a motorcycle on the right side of the road. The person on the motorcycle is not behind any obstruction, and is visible in the frame.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed and following the truck in front. The vehicle is not accelerating or decelerating, and is maintaining its current lane.
